review: It seems to perform well but there were no instructions for set up when you have a surround sound system ( and I think there are lots of users out there who do).  It took several hours of muddling around and a whole other cable the instructions don't addresss to make it work. If only there were more detailed instructions out there either on paper or on a website I would have been willing to give it five stars. As it is we almost gave up and sent it back before lucking up on the right combo of connections by trial and error. Really?  How hard would it be to put more info out there?
